long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SteemMe provides the quickest overview of your current account statistics !

Get your follower / following count, wallet data and your current vote power as well as steem power.

What's new ?
- Wallet Detail Page
- Set your private posting Keys in Options
- Claim Rewards in Wallet Detail Page if posting key is set
- Total Wallet Value
- STEEM / SBD Price Update every minute
- SBD Earnings Last 7 Days Graph

We are currently at Version 0.0.7 , so there is more to come !

https://github.com/caspernikus/SteemMe
